definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Now, most of the herb sold is fake and is made with plastic.
sentences.chinese: 現市面上賣的多爲假貨，用塑膠假冒的。

sentences.english: Therefore, the product becomes city surface in the nowadays sterilize one of strenuously the strongest antibiotic.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本品成爲現今市面上殺菌力最強的抗生素之一。

sentences.english: They are of the latest model that can be found in town.
sentences.chinese: 它們是現在市面上能找到的最新的款式。

sentences.english: Many products are on the market that provides this processing.
sentences.chinese: 市面上有很多產品提供這樣的處理功能。

sentences.english: There are great green yoga mats out there.
sentences.chinese: 市面上其實有不少環保的瑜伽墊。

sentences.english: The air conditioning on market a list of things of fish of special electrical outlet is jumbly , quality is uneven.
sentences.chinese: 市面上的空調專用插座魚目混雜，質量參差不齊。

sentences.english: Technically, Coca-Cola is no longer produced, and hasn't been commercially available for years.
sentences.chinese: 從技術上說，可口可樂在市面上已經消失多年了。

sentences.english: There are also commemorative issues of crowns.
sentences.chinese: 市面上也有一些克郎的紀念幣。

sentences.english: We also have another weappon against Justin's allergic nose: a nose sucking machine!
sentences.chinese: 一般市面上的小吸鼻器通常沒什麼效。

sentences.english: Rose oil is still used today as an 8)ingredient in over 75% of all perfumes.
sentences.chinese: 直到如今，市面上75%的香水成分仍含有玫瑰油。

sentences.english: This recipe book show us the common practice of the cantonese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 這本菜譜書向我們展示了市面上粵菜通行的做法。

sentences.english: Are you confused by the barrage of video cables available today?
sentences.chinese: 現在市面上隨處可見的各種視頻線是否讓你迷惑？

sentences.english: Cheap imitations that cut corners on the ingredients and in the manufacturing process have begun making inroads into the market.
sentences.chinese: 輕忽原料及做工的廉價仿效者開始在市面上出現。

sentences.english: There's been a big run on ice cream during this hot weather.
sentences.chinese: 這熱天氣使市面上對冰淇淋的需求量大增。

sentences.english: The polypropylene bags themselves are recycled misprinted rice bags.
sentences.chinese: 聚丙烯袋本身回收市面上袋大米。

sentences.english: This is the best baby cream out there.
sentences.chinese: 這是市面上最好滴嬰兒潤膚乳了。
